channel.title: Worm: An Unabridged Production + We've Got Worm
channel.description:
An introverted teenage girl with an unconventional superpower, Taylor goes out in costume to find escape from a deeply unhappy and frustrated civilian life. Her first attempt at taking down a supervillain sees her mistaken for one, thrusting her into the midst of the local ‘cape’ scene’s politics, unwritten rules, and ambiguous morals. As she risks life and limb, Taylor faces the dilemma of having to do the wrong things for the right reasons.
This is an unabridged fan-recording of Worm, written by John "Wildbow" McCrae. No copyright infringement is intended.
This podcast feed aggregates the analysis podcast We've Got Worm with the relevant episodes of Worm: An Unabridged Production.

image.title: Worm: An Unabridged Production + We've Got Worm

channel.author: Abaddon Productions
channel.itunes:author: Abaddon Productions + Doof! Media

An introverted teenage girl with an unconventional superpower, Taylor goes out in costume to find escape from a deeply unhappy and frustrated civilian life. Her first attempt at taking down a supervillain sees her mistaken for one, thrusting her into the midst of the local ‘cape’ scene’s politics, unwritten rules, and ambiguous morals. As she risks life and limb, Taylor faces the dilemma of having to do the wrong things for the right reasons.
This is an unabridged fan-recording of Worm, written by John "Wildbow" McCrae. No copyright infringement is intended.
This podcast feed aggregates the analysis podcast We've Got Worm with the relevant episodes of Worm: An Unabridged Production.

item.title: We've Got WORM - Episode 4: Shell
item.description:
Another Wednesday, another Wormcast! We're back with another episode of our weekly show dissecting the web serial Worm, arc by arc. As always, Parahumans expert Matt leads first time reader Scott on an epic journey where they discuss, debate, and nerd out on this excellent book.

This week the guys tackle Arc 4: Shell. You guys have been asking for two-hour episodes since we started and today you get it! 120 glorious minutes of us exploring the fourth arc. If you listen closely, you can hear our voices get really exhausted near the end. Dedication!

Also, check out the link below where you can track each and every one of Scott's Stupendous Speculations. See just how right he is. Or wrong!

As always, if you have any discussion questions you'd like us to present in the next episode, or just some feedback on how to make this show better, please don't hesitate to reach out to us on one of our many social media platforms.

A very special thanks to our generous new Patrons:
Melissa D
Nick L
AceofDiamond

Scott's Speculations

Support us on Patreon
Matt’s Twitter: @moridinamael
Scott’s Twitter:@scottdaly85
Stay updated with The Daly Planet: @dalyplanetfilms
Message us at dalyplanetfilms@gmail.com
See all of our podcasts, writing and more at www.dalyplanetfilms.com

Feature Image art created by Shadaan

item.title: We've Got WORM - Episode 3: Agitation
item.description:
Happy Wormsday everyone! We're back with another episode of our weekly show dissecting the web serial Worm, arc by arc. As always, Parahumans expert Matt leads first time reader Scott on an epic journey where they discuss, debate, and nerd out on this excellent book.

This week the guys tackle Arc 3: Agitation and it is a long one! But make sure you stick around after our beat by beat analysis to hear our new weekly segment: "Scott's Speculations." Here, Scott will make a handful of "educated guesses" on events that he thinks will happen in future arcs and you can all publicly laugh at how wrong he is.

If you have any discussion questions you'd like us to present in the next episode, or just some feedback on how to make this show better, please don't hesitate to reach out to us on one of our many social media platforms.

Support us on Patreon
Matt’s Twitter: @moridinamael
Scott’s Twitter:@scottdaly85
Stay updated with The Daly Planet: @dalyplanetfilms
Message us at dalyplanetfilms@gmail.com
See all of our podcasts, writing and more at www.dalyplanetfilms.com

Feature Image art created by NeoWorm

item.title: We've Got WORM - Episode 2: Insinuation
item.description:
We're back! After the outpouring of wonderful feedback received after the first episode, Scott and Matt have decided to make We've Got Worm a weekly podcast series. Each Wednesday (Wormsday) we'll come at you with an hour long discussion of another arc in epic Worm web serial.

This week we tackle Arc 2: Insinuation

If you have any discussion questions you'd like us to present in the next episode, or just some feedback on how to make this show better, please don't hesitate to reach out to us on one of our many social media platforms.

Support us on Patreon
Matt’s Twitter: @moridinamael
Scott’s Twitter:@scottdaly85
Stay updated with The Daly Planet: @dalyplanetfilms
Message us at dalyplanetfilms@gmail.com
See all of our podcasts, writing and more at www.dalyplanetfilms.com

Feature Image art created by Drunkfu

Worm and the Parahumans stories are the intellectual property of J.C. McCrae. No copyright infringement is intended.


This recording was made possible with the permission of J.C. McCrae.

item.title: We've Got WORM - Episode 1: Gestation
item.description:
We are very excited to announce a brand new regular podcast feature: We've Got Worm, our close reading and discussion of the cult web serial novel Worm.

Scott will be reading Worm for the first time and walking us through his impressions as he goes. Matt, who has read the whole series, will serve as Virgil to his Dante, guiding the discussion without spoiling what is to come. We believe this podcast will have a little something for everyone; whether you're a fan revisiting text or a first-time reader.

This week, the guys are walking through the first "arc" of the story, titled Gestation.

If you like this series and would like to see more, please let us know!

Support us on Patreon

Matt’s Twitter: @moridinamael

Scott’s Twitter:@scottdaly85

Stay updated with The Daly Planet: @dalyplanetfilms

Message us at dalyplanetfilms@gmail.com

See all of our podcasts, writing and more at www.dalyplanetfilms.com
item.content:encoded:
We are very excited to announce a brand new regular podcast feature: We've Got Worm, our close reading and discussion of the cult web serial novel Worm. Scott will be reading Worm for the first time and walking us through his impressions as he goes. Matt, who has read the whole series, will serve as Virgil to his Dante, guiding the discussion without spoiling what is to come. We believe this podcast will have a little something for everyone; whether you're a fan revisiting text or a first-time reader.

This week, the guys are walking through the first "arc" of the story, titled Gestation.

If you like this series and would like to see more, please let us know!

Support us on Patreon

Matt’s Twitter: @moridinamael

Scott’s Twitter:@scottdaly85

Stay updated with The Daly Planet: @dalyplanetfilms

Message us at dalyplanetfilms@gmail.com

See all of our podcasts, writing and more at www.dalyplanetfilms.com
